title: Obtain the Sinner
text: According to the legislation, I cannot resist your arrest, but I want you to know that you can never trap me if I want to leave.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Well, would you like to have a little chat with me now?

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Thank you for sending me into the depths of hell.

title: Level Start
text: Don't let me find your legal loophole.

title: Win Battles
text: Listen to your lawyer, and I will help you win it all.

title: Lose Battles
text: How much money does it take to change your mind?

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Do as I say.

title: Die in Battles
text: This is the judgment... I deserve.

title: Greeting
text: When there is a lawyer, there is strife. Only you can cope so well with having a lawyer as the first person you see each day.

title: Conversation 1
text: The scale is the symbol of law, and I can tip it in your favor.

title: Conversation 2
text: Mr. Fox? I like the name. It's one of the smartest animals.

title: Conversation 3
text: Everyone is born with the right to pursue justice with whatever method is employed.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: When gold coins are piled in front of people, many will trade their souls for it... and I gain justice from it.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: I am capable of getting you to do anything for me... but I can't bring myself to.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: If someone destroys the tender flower buds, they deserve hell no matter who it is, right?

title: Full Compliance
text: One day, you will bring punishment upon me, and I shall submit and accept it all.

title: Idle
text: As it happens, I have a few more files I need to read through. I'll grab a coffee with you later.

title: Annoyed
text: I have represented and won 38 cases of physical harassment, and you should know this, right?

title: Special Attention
text: I thought I would never get to experience this... feeling of special attention here.

title: Dispatch
text: I charge by the hour for working outside the office. It doesn't include additional fees such as consulting fees.

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Job done. The bill will be sent to your email later. Please remember to pay on time.

title: Level Up
text: Well, if you want to know whether I'm more eloquent, you can find out yourself.

title: Join Team
text: The war without gunfire is the war of words.

title: Attire Obtained
text: My dear friend, congratulations on crossing the twilight zone, and welcome to my palace.

title: Greeting
text: I offer you my goodwill, my dear friend, but... don't take it too seriously

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Pleasing poems and sweet serenades gush forth from my mouth and turn into sharp crescents.

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: I control all fairness, justice, metrology, and poetry in this world... Do you... wish to subvert me?

title: Idle
text: Don't worry. There's still time for you to find a way to pry the victory from my hands.

title: Annoyed
text: This is not the way to light a fire...

title: Level Up
text: Let's hear what you think.

title: Special Attention
text: Can you get the answer you want by just staring at me?
